description:
AFM is linked to vaccines! It’s not a rare disease, it’s a side effect of vaccines. They can EXPECT outbreaks because kids are getting vaccinated for school. 🤨
CDC Expects 2020 Outbreak of Rare, Polio-Like Condition Mostly Affecting Children
